wikipedia_page.main: Basil Graham Forsythe (17 October 1952–16 March 2012) was a Canadian artist. Although Forsythe was classified blind at birth he traveled extensively. He did not start painting until 1991 when his eyesight was restored by an operation.

response: * Graham Forsythe, the Canadian artist, was born in Ballymena.
